column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh :------  A bus hit a 75-year-old man on a bicycle and killed him.------The accident happened at 12.10 pm on December 28
column5: in front of  Duong Village primary school
column7: Phnom Penh.------The bus No. 3C-8602 was from Rasmei Phnom Penh Express Travel Company. ------The victim
column10: is a fisherman who lived in the village.------According to the source
column12: the vehicle was travelling along National Road 5 when it hit the bicycle. It continued to travel more than 100 meters
column13: before coming to a stop. the driver then fled on foot.------After the incident
column14: Phnom Penh Capital Authority measured the scene and took the bus and bike to Phnom Penh Police Commission. ------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/399709
